name: five
author: Armeen Talwandi, Amy Li, Angela Du, Denise Albeanu
description:
5 topics. 5 articles. 5 minutes. 
 A single sentence can set off a lifetime of change. Every change starts with an idea, and every idea starts with a read. All it takes is 5 minutes a day to jump start your journey to bring about change. This extension provides you with 5 new articles everyday, each one corresponding to one of the 5 topics in the SDG, ‘Industry’
